import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"プロジェクトを削除"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/projects/{project_id}/delete"} context={"endpoint"} />

プロジェクトを削除します。プロジェクト内のすべてのデプロイメントも削除されます。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"リクエスト"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"path","description":"プロジェクト ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"リクエストボディ"} body={undefined} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":""}}} />
